name: Butterflynamite
description:
Butterflynamite is a construction site demolish simulator.  You are equiped with TNT. Place the charges in the right place to trigger a chain reaction. Think twice before placing the charges, strategic thinking pays off with more havoc!

Controls:
- WSAD: camera rotation
- mouse: dynamite placement

Tips:
After placing dynamite you can change delay of each detonation on the left of the screen!
